info.description: Allows the viewing and creation of option contracts to assign/exercise/expire based on either the trade reference selected or the trades filtered based on - Derivatives Contract, Maturity Date, Options(Call / Put) and Strike Price
info.title: API for derivative events

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: Identifies the unique identifier of the transaction or contract.

parameters.name: maturityDate
parameters.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

parameters.name: strikePrice
parameters.description: The price at which the option holder has the right to buy (Call Options) or sell (Put Options) the underlying instrument, or to cash-settle the option if appropriate

parameters.name: callOrPut
parameters.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put.  Allowed values: - CALL  - PUT

parameters.name: tradeCurrency
parameters.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: optionStyle
parameters.description: The type of settlement rule that should be applied on the option. AMERICAN: An option that may be exercised at any time prior to its expiry date. EUROPEAN: An option that may only be exercised on its expiry date.

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: Identifies the unique identifier of the activity.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.description: Creates the manual assign contract to assign the lots based on either the trade reference selected or the trades filtered based on - Derivatives Contract, Maturity Date, Options(Call / Put) and Strike Price

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

callOrPut.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put.  Allowed values: - CALL  - PUT

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

transactionDetails.description: Commission/Tax charged for Seller side of the transaction

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

buyerCommission.description: Commission/Tax charged for Buyer side of the transaction

sellerCommission.description: Commission/Tax charged for Seller side of the transaction

closeoutIds.description: Identifier of the Derivatives closeout record

closeoutId.description: Identifier of the Derivatives closeout record

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

marketPrice.description: Current Market Price of the Security

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

contractSize.description: Trading units of the contract e.g. 3-month Short Sterling (LIFFE) ; Trading unit of 500,000 per lot

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

quoteCurrency.description: The currency in which the spot exchange rate is quoted

spotRate.description: Exchange rate applicable for spot trades.

spotPayoutRate.description: Exchange rate applicable between the Strike Quote Ccy and Payout Ccy.

payoutCurrency.description: Currency in which the payout is to be made

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
